text: @narendramodi @AmitShah Sir I m student of 12+1 just returned from Kota , as we are preparing for exams from last 3 years , exams were delayed due to covid19 , now we can't take it anymore , please take exams like mains and other private college exams because we can't study till death ,we also want rest
